title: Lesson 1 Quiz: The Power of Intention

questions.question: According to this lesson, what is the FIRST thing that matters before any action in Islam?
questions.explanation: Islam teaches that intention comes before action. Allah looks at why you act before what you do.

questions.question: Why can two people do the same action but only one be rewarded by Allah?
choices: Because one does it in public
questions.explanation: The reward depends on intention, not just the action itself.

questions.question: What did the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ teach in the hadith mentioned in this lesson?
choices: Intentions are less important than actions
questions.explanation: The Prophet ﷺ said: 'Actions are only judged by intentions.'

questions.question: What can quietly destroy good deeds, even prayer or charity?
questions.explanation: Showing off removes sincerity and can cancel reward.

questions.question: What should you do before praying or doing a good deed?
questions.explanation: The lesson teaches us to pause and ask who we are really doing the action for.
